thread.title: Nintendo Switch Pre-Order Link is Available
thread.title_full: Nintendo Switch Pre-Order Link is Available

author: Lucas M. Thomas
title: Nintendo Switch Pre-Order Link is Available

organizations.name: hardware  nintendo switch console set   see

text:
This article is a work in progress! We're constantly updating it as new links go live. Keep checking back for the most up-to-date info! 
Nintendo has finally lifted the lid on its newest system, the Nintendo Switch. Coming to North America on March 3 and priced at $299.99! Pre-orders have started going live at several retailers! 
Nintendo has noted that, in Japan, pre-orders for the Switch will not be available until January 21. 
THE HARDWARE 
Nintendo Switch Console Set 

See it on Amazon for $299.99
